### Description
The **Archive Documents (DA-hotspot) **task allows to load and archive documents into the Digital Archiving 3 software service using the legacy Digital Archiving Endpoint configuration.

> Important

This is a legacy task created to support the migration to Digital Archiving 3 build 3.37 (January 2023 release). For all new applications, please refer to the latest version of the task: [Archive Documents (DA) Batch Workflow Task Reference](/doxee-platform/docs/archive-documents-da-batch-workflow-task-reference).

> **Valid only for Batch Workflows**

Any documents uploaded to the Digital Archiving service through batch jobs that were not completed successfully will be automatically removed, in order to avoid manual recovery actions.

In particular, the following rules apply:

**Scenario**

**Behavior**

The job was canceled.

All uploaded documents are automatically removed or marked as "Removed" on Digital Archiving.

The job was suspended *before *the execution of the Archive documents (DA) task.

No action required as no documents were uploaded to Digital Archiving.

The job was suspended *during *the execution of the Archive documents (DA) task.

- If the job is resumed after it failed due to an infrastructure problem:

Replace all previously uploaded documents on DA.

- If the job is restarted:

Remove all previously uploaded documents, or mark them as "Removed" on DA.

The job was suspended *after *the execution of the Archive documents (DA) task.

- If the job is resumed: 

No action.

- If the job is restarted:

Remove all previously uploaded documents, or mark them as "Removed" on DA.

### Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

- Click on the **Store &gt; Resource **field and select the Digital Archiving Hotspot resource to use.

> Note

For more information, see: [Digital Archiving Hotspot Resource Reference](/doxee-platform/docs/digital-archiving-hotspot-resource-reference).

- In the **Input &gt; Index pattern**, enter the name of the XML index file or a filename pattern (in glob format) to identify it.

> Note

The default value is *LOADER.DA.INDEX.xml*.

> Note

For more information on the structure of the DA3 Loader index file, see: [Digital Archiving 3 Loader Index File](/doxee-platform/docs/digital-archiving-3-loader-index-file).
